meanings.definition: Tristearins: a type of fat found in animal and vegetable oils
meanings.sent1: The tristearins in the oil help make it thick and creamy.
meanings.sent2: Many cooking oils contain tristearins for flavor and texture.
meanings.sent3: The tristearins in the salad dressing decided to have a party with the vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The tristearins held hands tightly, forming a protective layer around the food.
meanings.sent5: As the tristearins melted, they enveloped the dish in a velvety embrace.

meanings.definition: Tristearins: a triglyceride consisting of three molecules of stearic acid
meanings.sent1: The tristearins are made up of stearic acid molecules bonded together.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the structure of tristearins to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The tristearins decided to race each other in the lab experiment.
meanings.sent4: The tristearins stood tall like three soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the tristearins looked like a trio of tiny pearls.
